This product is already averaging at above 4 stars so I won't add a lot about
the product, use experience, etc.  
  
However, the reason I am rating it 5-star is because of the warranty
experience I recently had...  
  
For some reason, the device would not charge. So I called up the warranty
1-800 number. Right from the automated IVR to the point someone picked up the
call was very quick (no random inputs requested ... your zip code or input
your product code or what not). Then, the person who picked up was extremely
professional and thorough. He took the info he needed from me and explained to
me the process that would be followed. He even asked if I preferred home
service or would like to take the product to a nearby service center. After I
said I preferred the home service option he told me to expect a call to
arrange for a visit within 4 hours before we hung up. Thereafter, I received
SMS and emails confirming the case and timely updates on when it had been
assigned, etc. Promptly I received a call in the evening asking when I shall
be available on the next day (which was a Sunday). Then, on the following day,
at the expected time, I received a call from the technician confirming my
address and that I am at home. The technician arrived promptly, had brought
the necessary equipment with him to test/examine the product out and soon
determined that something internal was wrong in the device (and that the
charger was okay). He immediately handed over a replacement unit to me, took
my signature, etc., gave some additional tips about maintaining the device and
left.  
  
This was the smoothest warranty service experience I have *ever* had with
*any* product, period! That, I think, makes this a 5-star product!

The received product is OK but the box of it is like already opened. Hence I
doubt that whether it is used product. You can see the attached images of the
package.

Worst packing .... Product box is been opened & crushed while opening outer

review:
This trimmer works tremendously fanatastic. I bet, You won't regret after
buying and using this.  
Here is my review after using it for 2 years.  
  
Advantages- Looks wise it's superb, Blue-black color combination is the
perfect.  
\- The feature that catches everyone's eye is Rotating wheel to increase the
length of the comb, you can simply adjust yourself on your depndinh and needs.  
\- You can also remove the comb if you wish and believe me It doesn't hurt you
at all like other cheap brand trimmer does. It provides you the zero shaving
as possible.  
\- You can simply register your trimmer on philips' official website and can
avail your warranty. In my case I got two years + one year extended warrenty.  
  
Disadvantages - If a led light or an indicator have provided, it would be easy
to know weither it is full charged or not.  
\- Well charging time and discharging time never bothered me much but when we
see it in instructions it scarifies you first that you will have to charge 10
hours to get 45 minutes of working.  
\- There is no any other cons that I found so far in two years.  
Hope this will help you out, Thanks.

trimmer fully satisfied full paisaa vasul got it in amazon great indain sale

Product is good

As always, it’s a Philips promise....  
Awesomely good product with a very low humming sound and the detachable part
is ergonomic so much so that you’ll never find it difficult to clean, wash or
handle it while traveling or finding a place in your bag.  
The battery backup is like never before phenomenon for it gives a full hour
backup with minimum 4 hours charging. The best part is that, it is available
to you at a pocket friendly price. This product made me happy.  
  
On comparing it with my last trimmer,  
An year back I bought a trimmer almost double the price of this one of the
same Philips company but that one proved a trouble to me. Just after six
months it sounded like a tractor and the detachable part got loose. It was
totally a menace. I wrote a review for that too, I don’t remember the model
number of that and actually I don’t even want to....  
  
I say go ahead and it’ll not disappoint you....

Nice product but packing is not good
